t: The Faith, The Fire, and The Future: Cozitot Mei Tai Carrier Review
s: This would not be a good carrier for brand new newborns, as they are more comfy in the frog leg position. Once their legs will naturally spread its a more viable option, as long as the carrier is not too wide for them, causing their legs to stick out rather than bend. Thanks for checking out the Cozitot Mei Tai Carrier! I hope you find it helpful. If you have any questions feel free to comment :) You can find the product here: http://www.amazon...
